programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Island of the Devil
programme.desc: Just 460,000 people live in Tasmania, an island off the southeast coast of mainland Australia. While its human population is small, the majestic state is rich in natural wonders and is known for its large tracts of pristine wilderness.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Sri Lanka: Monsoon Island
programme.desc: Lying like a teardrop in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is an island that defies convention. Poised just six degrees above the equator, it's less than 75,000 km sq in size. But it has enough wildlife to rival a continent.

programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Rainforest

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Sahara: Life on the Edge

programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a beat?up 1955 Oldsmobile into a classic custom. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of a beat up '55 Oldsmobile into a classic custom and takes on a Henry J chop top. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Flavin returns, sparking a gang war, and helps Dylan develop as a Paradine.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: A crystal that can restore the Andromeda's power is discovered, but in order to get it, Dylan must work for the mine's owner.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tunnels are discovered on Seefra which can be used to reach eight other Seefra planets.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When an old man is killed, Beka, Rhade and Harper are the main suspects and stand trial.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rhade leads the rebels in battle against a warlord on Seefra-5.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan discovers that Beka's boyfriend was really Drago Musevini, and he used Beka's DNA to create the Nietzscheans.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: In this episode of Sensing Murder we learn about the murder of Angela Blackmoore, a 21 year old woman with a 2 year old child. The child was not harmed and the killer has not been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Stone Cold
programme.desc: In 2004, Brendan Percy was found dead of hypothermia and dehydration in a sub alpine area above Oamaru in suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Blood Money
programme.desc: Psychics Kelvin Cruickshank (NZ) and Deb Webber (Aus) investigate the unsolved murder of Lower Hutt pensioner 91 year old George Engelbrecht. In 1979, a burglar broke into George's home and beat the old man to death in his bed.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.desc: On the 6th October 1997, 14-year-old Lauren Barry and 16-year-old Nicole Collins disappeared while walking along a road near their home town of Bega, on the New South Wales south coast.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.desc: A young Sydney man was found guilty of strangling his ex-girlfriend and stuffing the teenager's body in a cricket bag.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Twenty Questions
programme.desc: People are walking on eggshells at Drovers Run. Kate has split with Patrick and Stevie is more or less at war with Alex. Both women deny they are stressed, and Kate for one has been keeping busy preparing for Dave’s imminent departure for Africa.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Second Chances
programme.desc: It’s shearing time at Drovers Run. The sheep are in great condition, the weather is perfect, the girls are keen, the first day all brimming with promise.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: All The Wrong Places
programme.desc: A charming good-looking man arrives at Drovers looking for Killarney. His name is Marcus Turner and he is quite enamored of Stevie. He’s been sent by Bryce to look over Killarney’s books, inspect the property and report back.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Digging Up The Past
programme.desc: Jodi asks Riley about the manacles she found in the dam, and he jokingly puts them round her wrist. As Jodi struggles to free her hand, she almost hears an eerie aural vision. Is that someone running and panting, or is it just Tayler approaching?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Thicker Than Water
programme.desc: Alex and Marcus come to blows over the future of Killarney, and Marcus reveals a secret that will change their lives forever. Jodi is determined to help Riley make peace with his dying father.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Reaching Out
programme.desc: Jodi questions her sanity when she is haunted by visions of her ancestor Emma McLeod and a murdered convict. Patrick accidentally destroys a historic trophy belonging to Drovers Run.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Shock Island / Asylum & Testing Lab / The Surf Hotel
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Scott Township, Pennsylvania to investigate the Pennsylvania Asylum and Testing Lab.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Moonshine & Madness
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters: slavery, murder and madness are behind the hauntings at the notorious Graham Mansion. TAPS travels to Virginia to determine the true source of the claims that have taken place at this historical location.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dark Shadows
programme.desc: The TAPS' team is called out to Newport, RI to hold the first ever-paranormal investigation at Seaview Terrace; best recognized from the TV show Dark Shadows.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Timber Kings: High Rollers
programme.desc: Just hours from Manhattan, Beat creates a country retreat for a demanding French financier, while Joel’s Australian client makes a last minute request for a three-car garage.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Trial By Fire
programme.desc: In foggy Newfoundland, Peter builds a duck-hunting cabin and gets initiated into island culture.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: In Northern BC, a challenging modern log home has Beat and his crew risking life and limb. Meantime, Joel and Bryan Sr. take a chance on hiring an eccentric perfectionist to carve a life-size statue on a tight deadline.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Active Duty
programme.desc: In California, Joel is under the gun, with a job that’s behind schedule before it even begins. Meanwhile, Beat marshals the troops to finish a mega project on the verge of shipping out.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Make a Mark
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. makes a mark in the self-proclaimed log home capital of the world. Back at the yard, Andre tries to control Peter when his pent-up creativity goes in overdrive.

programme.title: Timber Kings: The Getaway
programme.desc: As winter approaches, the rush to build two summer getaway homes is on. Peter leads his team in Alberta while Bryan Jr. and his guys head north to Alaska.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drank Sinatra
programme.desc: Kayla's excessive drinking along with the cheating is a deal breaker from Bryan. Bryan can no longer tolerate Kayla's alcohol-fueled tantrums. She says he is controlling and doesn't put her and her child first. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Operation Repo: T-Bone Trouble
programme.desc: The team's work with anger management starts to pay off - with disastrous consequences. Matt and Sonia get into a standoff with a wealthy divorcee, his daughter, and her raging boyfriend.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Flame-Thrown for a Loop
programme.desc: Lou struggles to pick up the pieces after the accident leaves him needing Sonia more than ever. Lou and Carlos deal with a big man in a tiny car, but when Carlos lets his guard down he's delivered some serious blows.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Probation Abomination
programme.desc: Sonia returns, but not before putting the team on probation and laying some ground rules.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Russian Roulette
programme.desc: Matt and Sonia take on an award-winning fencing coach, but all bets are off when his students go on the offensive with real swords.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Little Froy's Big Mistake
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take on a grungy fisherman, but when he isn't afraid to damage his own boat, Froy is the one who is sinking fast.

programme.title: Operation Repo: M.I.A. & D.E.A
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy go missing, Sonia is on a mission to figure out what they've got up their sleeves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Suspicious Packages
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy repo a hummer from a bachelorette who is down to party, but when the cops arrive it's the repo team who is in for a shock.

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Class Clown
programme.desc: Matt and Froy are sent on a wild goose chase around LA for a mini-van, and when they find their debtor selling contraband out of the trunk Matt is further convinced that Lyndah has been scheming against him.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Revenge Gone Wrong
programme.desc: When Matt almost gets run down by a posse of graffiti-packing gangsters, he sets into motion a plan of revenge against Lyndah.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: The Game: Do The Wright Thing
programme.desc: After outing Clay, Malik's invitation to appear on his favorite childhood television show, "Mookie", is revoked.

programme.title: The Game: Punk Ass Chauncey
programme.desc: With the encouragement of Melanie and Kelly, Tasha decides that it is time to let Malik know who his real father is.

programme.title: The Game: Take A Bow
programme.desc: Malik's only interest is to know everything about his father. Meanwhile, Tasha finds out that Rick's job is on the line and Mel thinks Derwin is trying to teach her a lesson.

programme.title: The Game: Truth And Consequences
programme.desc: Tasha accuses Kelly of betrayal, so Tasha introduces Jason to a beautiful talk show host.

programme.title: The Game: Hill Street Blues
programme.desc: Derwin gets jealous when Janay's ex-boyfriend comes into town; Melanie turns to the cable guy for comfort after the loss of her relationship with Derwin.

programme.title: The Game: The Third Legacy
programme.desc: Malik meets his half-sister and worries that he may have slept with her before they knew they were related; Tasha meets her former husband's wife and is shocked to see that the woman is surprisingly similar to herself.

programme.title: The Game: Put A Ring On It
programme.desc: Kelly is forced to come to terms with Jason's new girlfriend Camille. Meanwhile, Tasha and Kelly are planning an engagement party for Mel and Derwin.

programme.title: The Game: The Fall Of The Roman
programme.desc: While shopping with Tasha, Mel finds her perfect wedding dress. Meanwhile, Jason's relationship evolves to the next level, and he wants Camille to meet his daughter.

programme.title: The Game: I Want It All And I Want It Now
programme.desc: Melanie decides she wants to get married to Derwin before Janay's baby is born; Kelly and Jason share an emotional moment; Tasha finally admits to setting Jason up with Camille.

programme.title: Run's House: That Guy
programme.desc: Angela's new relationship with pro skateboarder, Terry Kennedy, better known as T.K., starts to rub Vanessa the wrong way when Angela no longer has time for her.

programme.title: Run's House: Say Hello To My Little Friend
programme.desc: When Russy decides he wants to be a magician, Rev is concerned he might be taking on one too many hobbies. With JoJo's help, the Great Russini is a BIG hit!

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Hillary and her nine-year-old son Hunter are being harassed by a shadow presence in their Victorian home in Newburgh, Indiana. Trap doors in the basement reveal artifacts from a bygone era, and the clients have recorded persistent strange noises.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name
programme.desc: Ryan Buell and company set out on one of their most dangerous cases to date - to help a single mother who is experiencing paranormal activity in a home that was once the site of brutal murder.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt2
programme.desc: The second part of Yvette Fielding and the team's investigation of the imposing and abandoned Gloucester Prison.

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt3
programme.desc: The third part of Yvette Fielding and the team's investigation into the very haunted and abandoned Gloucester Prison. With the team splitting up the activity rises and something is trying to stop Yvette and Glen.

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads team in a violent, secret investigation. Place's name and location concealed due to extreme haunting. Little history, aggressive entities a mystery. Can they reveal the darkness and face the unknown?

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: For the Love of Larry
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark rescue victims trapped in a car, thanks to a helpful dog.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Another Kind of War, Another Kind of Peace
programme.desc: A man whose son died in Vietnam learns that he has an Amerasian grandson.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10

programme.title: On the Case: This is for Her

programme.title: On the Case: She Wasn't Alone
programme.desc: A beautiful young woman is viciously murdered just 24 hours after she was engaged to be married.

programme.title: On the Case: Stacy's Story

programme.title: On the Case: River of Sadness
programme.desc: A heartbreaking mystery begins with the discovery of a young woman's body floating in Washington state's Yakima River.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Surrounded by Cylon warships, Commander Adama reluctantly joins forces with the glory-hungry Commander (played by guest star Lloyd Bridges) of the battlestar Pegasus in a desperate surprise attack on their Cylon enemies.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Commander Adama is critically injured when Cylon warriors carry out a kamikaze-like mission against the Battlestar Galactica, causing a raging inferno aboard the ship and threatening the lives of the last survivors of the human race.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: An alien joins the Galactica fleet, attracting its people, including Apollo’s girlfriend, Sheba, with mysterious powers and promises of a successful end to their search for Earth.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger grants the interplanetary immigrants three miraculous wishes in exchange for their blind allegiance.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Starbuck must save a man he believes to be his long-lost father (special guest star Fred Astaire), from bloodthirsty Borellian henchmen who are out to kill him.

programme.title: Killer Town: Brandon, MB
programme.desc: When Erin Chorney disappears without a trace, investigators go to exceptional lengths to discover her whereabouts.

programme.title: Killer Town: Eldorado, IL
programme.desc: When a revered small-town physician lies about his whereabouts the night of his son’s murder, police investigate the death of another son seven years earlier.

programme.title: Killer Town: Gormania, WV
programme.desc: Cathy Ford goes missing one fateful night and no one knows why, but a burnt car and blood soaked trailer might uncover the truth.

programme.title: Killer Town: Gunnison, CO
programme.desc: When Jake Millison vanishes without a trace, his loyal friends stop at nothing to unearth the shocking truth behind that fateful night.

programme.title: Killer Town: Athens, WI
programme.desc: Just outside the sleepy town of Athens, WI, Kenneth Kunz returns to his farm to find four of his family members murdered and one missing. Authorities begin an exhaustive search for his missing mother.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Murder Of Stephen Cameron
programme.desc: Gripping documentary examining the fatal stabbing of 21-year-old motorist Stephen Cameron during a motorway altercation in 1996.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Mystery Of Glacier Mummy
programme.desc: Mountain climbers in California find the body of a U.S. Army soldier. In Alaska, strange bundles of canvas and wood high up on a mountain are discovered. Volcanic glass is found in an unexpected place. A vital WWII weather station is uncovered.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Siberia's Frozen Necropolis
programme.desc: Researchers find a mummy buried in a strange way. A legendary polar exploration vehicle goes missing in Antarctica. A glacier cave on Mt. St. Helens is explored. An island in the Bering Sea may contain clues to the extinction of the woolly mammoth.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Mystery Of Mummy Cabin
programme.desc: The remains of an ancient log cabin buried in permafrost are examined. High in the Arctic, a huge metal tower stands alone on the desolate landscape. An odd looking wooden idol is found. Strange sounds are heard emanating from the northern lights.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Lost On Killer Mountain
programme.desc: Merging advanced scanning technology and scientific research, the series investigates the curiosities that have been lost for millennia, or never seen before, exploring how and why they ended up in the most desolate and distant corners of the planet.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Riddle Of Whale Bone Alley
programme.desc: Merging CGI recreations, advanced scanning technology and scientific research, this series journeys to the planet’s most remote, cold and inhospitable places to reveal great mysteries that were once frozen in time.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Ancient Ice Zombies
programme.desc: Thirty World War II aircraft all crashed in the same spot on the Greenland Ice sheet, causing experts to wonder if they all fell victim to the Arctic’s Bermuda Triangle.

programme.title: Moesha: Psyche Your Mind
programme.desc: Based on the family turmoil, the family begins counseling, but Moesha doesn’t want to air the family’s 'dirty laundry'.

programme.title: Moesha: Teacher
programme.desc: Moesha is attracted to a substitute teacher at Crenshaw. After they kiss, he leaves the school for 'personal reasons'.

programme.title: Moesha: I Know What You Did In The Third Grade
programme.desc: Moesha and her friends are stalked by a student who was just released from jail who they haven’t seen since the third grade when he got into trouble because of them. Parody of Brandy’s feature 'I Still Know What You Did Last Summer…'

programme.title: Moesha: A Terrible Thing Happened On My Tour Of College
programme.desc: Moesha and her friends are invited to a college to attend a Prospective Freshman Weekend and someone slips a 'roofie' in her drink. Her boyfriend Aaron keeps her from being taken advantage of.

programme.title: Moesha: Birth Control
programme.desc: Moesha gets birth control pills when she decides she would like to lose her virginity to Aaron. However, things get complicated when Dee finds the pills in her purse.

programme.title: Moesha: A Class Act Christmas
programme.desc: Moesha, Hakeem, and the other employees of the Class Act are held hostage by a man dressed as Santa Claus protesting age discrimination.

programme.title: Moesha: The Crush
programme.desc: A friend of Myles who has a crush on Moesha pretends he cannot read so she can tutor him. However, after an article she writes about the success she has had with the little student is published in the LA Times, Moesha learns a hard lesson.

programme.title: Moesha: Barking Up The Wrong Tree
programme.desc: Hakeem accepts a job as assistant manager of the Class Act claiming there are financial difficulties at home. Moesha, concerned about his college education, confronts his mother who denies his claims.

programme.title: Moesha: Life Imitating Art
programme.desc: Racial tensions mount in Moesha’s high school after a mural depicting Latin American hero Caesar Chavez is purposely defaced.

programme.title: Moesha: OhMiGod, Fanatic
programme.desc: After Moesha and Kim have a huge fight, Moesha is surprised when MTV shows up at her door to film her bringing her best friend Kim to meet her favorite singer. Leanne Rimes guest stars.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: North Yorkshire
programme.desc: This week Kirstie and Phil's challenge is to find two very different properties in Yorkshire.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Chelmsford
programme.desc: Location, Location, Location is off to Chelmsford this week to solve the property problems of two couples at opposite ends of the budget scale.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Berkshire Revisits
programme.desc: Our two couples are at a similar stage in their lives, looking to buy their first homes together. Each had set their sights on pricey patches in the costly capital, but did they really know what they wanted and where they wanted it?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Guildford
programme.desc: This week Kirstie and Phil are in Surrey on a quest to find dream homes for two sets of frustrated house hunters. Two very different budgets and briefs but with the property market raging it looks like they've taken on double the trouble.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Kent
programme.desc: 20-somethings Sophie and Niall are ready to buy their first place. They say they want something practical-but it soon becomes clear that for super-fussy Sophie- practical is no match for party pad.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: South East England
programme.desc: One family is stuck in a house bursting at the seams and the other is stuck in one room at mum and dads. It's a quest for space-and it's up to Kirstie and Phil to make these searches blast off.

programme.title: Dynasty: Sammy Jo
programme.desc: Krystle accompanies Daniel to New York for his reunion with Sammy Jo, the child he's never known. While looking through photos Ashley snapped on assignment at a rock concert, Jeff is stunned to spot Fallon among the crowd.

programme.title: Dynasty: Kidnapped
programme.desc: As Alexis and Amanda emerge from an exclusive bridal salon, a car suddenly screeches to a halt and Amanda is pulled inside. A high-speed chase ensues. As Dex forces the kidnapper's car onto the sidewalk, Amanda breaks free.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Heiress
programme.desc: Dex tells a devastated Krystle that Daniel Reece is dead. Steven is outraged when Sammy Jo decides to fight for custody of her son in court. Jeff proposes marriage to Ashley. Sammy Jo learns that her monies will be held in trust with Krystle as executor.

programme.title: Dynasty: Royal Wedding
programme.desc: Elena confesses to Amanda that nothing happened in the bedroom with Prince Michael. Sammy Jo fits her roommate Rita with a blonde wig and has her practice duplicating Krystle's voice. Fallon has chosen a new name and heads for Denver.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Aftermath
programme.desc: Those surviving the massacre in Moldavia are separated and held at the palace; Krystle and Alexis are imprisoned in the palace dungeon; Sammy Jo reveals her scheme to Rita; Fallon, suffering from amnesia, reacts to seeing the name Colby.

programme.desc: A woman hits a parked Jaguar while parallel parking, facing a lawsuit from her father for unpaid parking tickets and car damage. Another woman sues her ex-fiancé for his share of a canceled wedding, a loan for a car, and unpaid credit card charges.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the world’s most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Remote Cities
programme.desc: Brave the frontiers of the world’s most remote cities. More than distant trading posts and isolated regional hubs, cities like Alice Springs, Jaipur and even Las Vegas serve as gateways to the wild places of the Earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the world’s greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Sacred Sites
programme.desc: Ancient in architecture and detailed in design, these man-made masterpieces stand as testaments to the strength of human faith. These sites endure as a timeless reminder of resilience, respect, and the need to reflect.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the World’s Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: Arthur: Phony Fern/Brain's Shocking Secret
programme.desc: When Fern's parents give her a cell phone for emergencies, she soon becomes hooked on it. Brain is the smartest kid in class. Everyone knows that! What they don't know is that he was kept back in Kindergarten. Will Binky spill the beans?

programme.title: Arthur: Buenas Noches, Vicita/Prunella Packs It In
programme.desc: Vicita Molina has lost her favorite bedtime book – can Arthur help her re-create it? Prunella is already starting to think about college! Will she crack under the heavy load or will she learn to relax and do the things she actually enjoys?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. on Ice/Spoiled Rotten!
programme.desc: D.W. tells her friends that she's a fantastic skater, but she can barely stand on ice! With a skating party coming up, how will she face everyone and tell them the truth? Accused of being spoiled, Muffy sets out to prove her friends wrong.

programme.title: Arthur: Bud's Knotty Problem/That’s MY Grandma!
programme.desc: When Bud falls in love with a snazzy new pair of boots, he might face his toughest adventure yet - learning to tie his shoes. D.W. gets jealous when Grandma Thora becomes the most popular babysitter in town.

programme.title: Arthur: Lost!/The Short, Quick Summer
programme.desc: One day, Arthur falls asleep on a bus and awakens in a strange part of town. Will he ever find his way home? Can he keep himself from crying? Next, summer vacation is over? What about all those great, fun things Arthur intended to do?

programme.title: Arthur: Opposites Distract/Just the Ticket
programme.desc: Arthur and Buster have always been best friends, but when a leaky roof forces Arthur to study in Buster's room, they discover that they make better friends than roommates. Arthur's ecstatic when he wins free concert tickets on the radio.

programme.title: Arthur: Room to Ride/The Frensky Family Fiasco
programme.desc: With Lance Armstrong’s support, Binky and his friends take to the streets to convince residents to vote for new bike safety lanes. Francine wants the Frenskys to be closer, but a weekly Family Night turns out to be harder than expected.

programme.title: Arthur: The Contest/Prove It
programme.desc: What would happen if Arthur and his friends entered a contest to write stories for their favorite TV show? Then, look out world, D.W. has discovered science! But D.W.'s new-found passion proves that a little knowledge is a dangerous thing.

programme.title: Arthur: To Tibble the Truth/Waiting to Go
programme.desc: When the Tibble Twins' constant lying lands them in constant trouble, they promise to tell only the truth. Binky and Brain collide on the soccer field, breaking Brain's new watch and nearly breaking their friendship.

programme.title: War Story: The Last Ship: The Sinking of the Esquimalt
programme.desc: On 16 April 1945, a mere three weeks before German surrender, the submarine fired a single torpedo that sank the last Canadian naval vessel lost to enemy action.

programme.title: War Story: Buchenwald Airmen
programme.desc: For two months in 1944, 168 Allied airmen were shot down over occupied France, betrayed to the Gestapo by the same collaborator, transported to the Nazi concentration and slave labour camp Buchenwald.

programme.title: War Story
programme.desc: In the longest campaign of the Second World War, from 1939 to 1945, German submarines desperately try to sever Britain’s shipping lifeline across the Atlantic Ocean. Canada plays the central role in the campaign.

programme.title: War Story: Not One Step Back: The Battle of Stalingrad
programme.desc: In the summer of 1942, the Germans advance to seize the rich oilfields of the Caucasus. In their path, the city of Stalingrad, its Soviet defenders personally ordered by Stalin to “take not one step back".

programme.title: War Story: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: Royal Canadian Air Force bombing operations play a crucial role in disrupting German infrastructure ahead of the Normandy invasion of June 1944. In the process, dozens of Canadian airmen are forced to bail out over occupied Belgium and France.

programme.title: War Story: Whistle for a Tiffy
programme.desc: From D-Day, Tactical Air Force fighter-bombers played a pivotal role in Allied battlefield success; Canadian soldiers knew they could always “whistle for a Tiffy”.

programme.title: War Story: Surviving Dieppe
programme.desc: The Dieppe assault of 19 August 1942 is the worst day in Canadian military history: in just 8 hours, 907 Canadians were killed. For 2,000 of their comrades, nearly three years of incarceration in German prison camps followed.

programme.title: War Story: D-Day plus 1
programme.desc: The Canadian stand against the 12th SS Panzer Division Hitlerjugend immediately after D-Day allowed the Allies to switch to the offensive and truly begin the liberation of Europe.

programme.title: War Story: Falaise, the corridor of death
programme.desc: The Canadian army played the pivotal role in closing the Falaise Gap and ensuring Allied victory in the Normandy Campaign in August 1944.

programme.title: War Story: Where Hell is: The Leopold and the Scheldt
programme.desc: The Allies liberated Antwerp, the world’s largest deep-water port, on 4 September 1944, but it could only be accessed via the Scheldt Estuary, the perfect place for the Germans to make a stand.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Chanelle is the light Michael needed in his life, but out of the blue she's disappeared, leaving only Nev and Max to help him find his missing love. (S5, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Felicia
programme.desc: Mike and Felicia met online and soon hit it off. After agreeing to meet, Felicia stood Mike up, offering only thin excuses. Can Mike trust Felicia - or will he end up disappointed? (S1, ep12)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Kristen
programme.desc: Mike met Kristen on Facebook. They quickly forged a deep connection, but Mike's frequent efforts to meet Kristen have been futile. Will Mike finally get face-to-face with Kristen? (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike and Caroline
programme.desc: Mike fell in love with Caroline online. He grew suspicious when she continually evaded meeting him, yet left notes at his car. Is Caroline an imposter or is she just afraid? (S2, ep16)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Felicia
programme.desc: Mike and Felicia met online and soon hit it off. After agreeing to meet, Felicia stood Mike up, offering only thin excuses. Can Mike trust Felicia - or will he end up disappointed?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Kristen
programme.desc: Mike met Kristen on Facebook. They quickly forged a deep connection, but Mike's frequent efforts to meet Kristen have been futile. Will Mike finally get face-to-face with Kristen?

programme.title: Jersey Shore: From the First Fist Pump
programme.desc: An entertaining look back at the first three seasons of Jersey Shore - complete with all the comedy, drama, mischievous antics, and water cooler moments that keep people talking.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Going to Italia
programme.desc: The housemates pack up their hair extensions & Shore Store t-shirts & jet off for an Italian adventure. But the culture-shock that awaits is nothing compared to their shocking new hook-ups. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Like More than a Friend
programme.desc: Deena & Pauly consider the consequences should they hook up. The Situation tries to take his friendship with Snooki to the next level. Ron & Sammi try to be friends but old habits die hard. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Twinning
programme.desc: With twins in the mix, it's double trouble as bi-curious Deena pulls the robbery on both The Situation and Vinny. Plus, The Situation's 'secret hook-up' with Snooki is revealed. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Crime and Punishment
programme.desc: The boys harass Deena for stealing a girl from Vinny's bed. Ronnie & Sammi are back to their old ways, but this time The Situation is involved in their drama. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 107
programme.desc: Jeremy plans a picnic to confess his deep affection for his best friend Amanda. Self-proclaimed ladies' man Nate thinks he's finally found a girl to make him quit his partying ways.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 114
programme.desc: Bryan and Megan have been best friends for 10 years and he can no longer keep his feeling contained. Kenise thinks that she and James can be more than workout buddies.

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Catch a Stalker
programme.desc: Fifteen-year-old Penny Chang of Shaker Heights, Ohio was stalked and killed by her older brother’s best friend, 21-year-old Scott Strothers.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Choice
programme.desc: In August 2009, Sandra Franklin called police to report a confrontation with her husband, Dr. Peter Franklin. Shortly after, authorities received a call from Peter, who had been stabbed. Within hours, Peter was dead and Sandra was charged with murder.

programme.title: 48 Hours: For Love or Money?
programme.desc: Celeste Beard claims she is innocent of the murder of her husband Steven Beard, co-founder of an Austin television station. After a life of abuse and depression, Celeste married Beard. In October 1999, Beard was fatally shot while lying in bed.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Prisoners in Paradise
programme.desc: When Lois McMillen, a Connecticut artist was found dead on the British Virgin Island of Tortola in January 2000, four young American tourists were charged with her brutal murder.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Every Picture Tells A Story
programme.desc: On February 15, 2009, Cathy McNaughton was stabbed to death in her home in Sharpsburg, Georgia. The day had started with her husband Alec serving her breakfast in bed.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Natalee Holloway: New Clues In Paradise
programme.desc: A report on new details into the search for Natalee Holloway, a U.S. teenager who disappeared on May 30, 2005 during a post-graduation trip in the Caribbean island of Aruba.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Sweet Charity
programme.desc: The fraudulent international activities of Gerald and Catherine Hagar, professional fund raisers for charity, take the IMF to an estate on the French-Italian border.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Council pt. 1
programme.desc: Jim Phelps leads the IMF on an assignment to destroy the syndicate, a criminal empire headed by Frank Wayne.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Council pt. 2
programme.desc: The IMF continues its fight against organized crime.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Astrologer
programme.desc: The IMF accepts a critical mission to rescue Nikolai Kurzon, the leader-in-exile of the Baltic state of Veyska who has been kidnapped by Col. Stahl (Steve Ihnat), head of the secret police.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Echo of Yesterday
programme.desc: The resurgence of neo-Nazism in Germany takes the IMF to Bavaria, where Marcus von Frank (Hans Gudegast) threatens to become a second Hitler.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is pretending to be a great detective, and needs a mystery to solve! Barney sees Riff protecting a nest full of duck eggs.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Blame Game - Airplanes
programme.desc: Marcos accidentally breaks an art show project that Melanie has made. Afraid that she will be angry, he doesn't say anything, but then feels guilty. Barney helps him see that honesty and taking responsibility for what we do is always best. together.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Big Brother Rusty
programme.desc: Barney's excited to find out that Rusty's family is adopting a new baby girl from China; however, Rusty feels differently. He's not sure if he's going to be a good brother, and he doesn't know much about China.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop is surprised by the first day of cold weather, Barney helps her see that winter is a wonderful time. On a hot summer day, Barney teaches BJ about all the activities you can do in the summer.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The New Kid - The Princess And The Frog
programme.desc: When Riff meets a new friend in the park, BJ feels a little left out. BJ goes to great lengths to try to find a new friend for himself. Barney helps BJ see that we don't have to forget old friends when we make new ones.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Friends the Doctor
programme.desc: Time for a check-up! Barney helps his friends discover the world of doctors and dentists as they learn about healthy habits like brushing teeth, getting checkups, eating healthy foods and getting exercise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: At Home in the Park
programme.desc: The children work together to make a bird house. They are happy to learn that the bird will have lots of company; many animals make their homes in the park too!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: China - Welcome, Cousin Riff
programme.desc: BJ is waiting for a very special letter from his pen pal in China. The letter reveals that his pen pal is coming for a visit. With the help of friends in the park, BJ hurries to get the park ready.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop forgets to say "please" and "thank you". Riff shares his dream of becoming an inventor.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Nothing But Net
programme.desc: Ton and Allen face their toughest challenge yet when two old rivals join forces. The guys dig up an off-road motorcycle and a pair of net guns, while the staff clashes with mystery shoppers back at Haff Ton Pawn.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Missouri Loves Company
programme.desc: On a visit to see Ton's sister in Missouri for some rafting and relaxation, the guys hit up a fast-paced live auction. After some tough losses, Ton and Allen score a ballista and an anvil set made for an explosive sport.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Always Money in Philadelphia
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, the guys face a shady bidder with inside information and former NFL star Vince Papale in a battle for a vintage football passing machine and a colonial musket that could be worth huge money if it's real.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rock-et to Me!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen end up in a turf war at a Hollywood auction and at odds with each other over whether to gamble on what could be an antique slot machine. Allen attempts to fly a jetpack.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Once a Pawn a Time
programme.desc: Ton and Allen discover that owning a pawn shop is way more trouble than they expected. With bills stacking up, even an antique ammo collection and some classic football helmets may not be enough to put the guys in the black.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Don't Taze Me Bro
programme.desc: Two fierce opponents best Ton and Allen at the auction, leaving the duo in the lurch with a "trash unit" and little chance of breaking even for the day. And Ton gets tazed.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: It's Raining Ton
programme.desc: The guys take Big Sis to her first auction - and when things get ugly, she becomes their secret weapon. Ton tests out a "blob" and Allen gets shot with a riot gun.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Maci has a panic attack when she drives by the gas station where the shooting took place. Amber reveals that she is bisexual. Catelynn finds out that her brother has a girlfriend. (S9, ep20)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Catelynn considers having Nova in the room when she gives birth. Zach pursues a real estate license but Cheyenne is concerned he will not be able to balance a newborn with a new career. (S9, ep21)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Maci explains her PTSD to Bentley while Mackenzie and Josh get advice from a parenting coordinator. Catelynn and Tyler try to wean Vaeda off her pacifier before the new baby arrives. (S9, ep22)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Catelynn and Tyler explain Carly's adoption to Nova. Cheyenne finds out she will likely be induced for the safety of her baby. Maci makes healthy lifestyle changes to help manage her PCOS. (S9, ep23)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Mackenzie struggles to keep her blood sugar under control and lashes out at Josh. Gary reaches out to a parenting coach for advice on Leah and Amber's relationship. (S9, ep24)

programme.title: Teen Mom: Pros and Cons
programme.desc: Amber and Gary try to get the no-contact order lifted; Maci wants to cut Ryan out of her life; Farrah makes an unexpected choice; Butch moves in with Catelynn and Tyler.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Civilized Lies
programme.desc: When a beloved off-duty NYPD officer perishes in a robbery, the CSIs use the art of interrogation to break down their suspects and get to the truth.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Nine Thirteen
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate when a masked man is found at the bottom of a notorious skyscraper known for its history of mysterious deaths.

programme.title: CSI: New York: White Gold
programme.desc: When a young pizza maker is carjacked, the CSI New York team of investigators must determine what the perpetrators were really after.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Seth and Apep
programme.desc: Mac and the team partner with D.B. Russell to outsmart Christine’s kidnappers before they run out of time to save her life.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Danny and the team investigate when a young woman's body is found in a Ferrari.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Blood Sugar
programme.desc: When a sugar refinery explodes, Horatio Caine and the CSI team make a shocking discovery about one of the factory's employees.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: On The Hook
programme.desc: When a fisherman narrowly escapes death, the CSI team has to dodge bullets to keep him alive and find out who's after him.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Happy Birthday
programme.desc: When a pregnant woman is assaulted, Horatio and the team fight for her and her baby's life while tracking down her attacker.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Match Made In Hell
programme.desc: When the investigation of a dead millionaire leads the CSIs to an elite dating service, Ryan poses as a businessman to expose the matchmaker's lies.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A teenage boy shoots up LVPD headquarters and holds Russell hostage.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Hitchhike to Hell
programme.desc: Colorado police pursuing a serial killer are horrified when the message on a pager found in the snow near a victim’s abandoned vehicle reveals an unthinkable predator: one sworn to protect and serve.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Shattered Dreams
programme.desc: Colorado authorities hone in on a suspect after finding a name tag in a bloody sweatshirt near the scene of a young girl’s murder – but are stunned when DNA reveals they’ve got the wrong man.

programme.title: Sins & Secrets: Boone
programme.desc: In 1989, Jeni Gray inexplicably vanished while on a morning walk. Police were perplexed when no trace of Jeni could be found, but that confusion gave way to horror when a second woman disappeared.

programme.title: Sins & Secrets: Fayetteville
programme.desc: In 2000, a fatal shooting made Michelle Theer an Air Force widow. The investigation into her husband’s death led police to an Army Ranger who was taking orders from and unlikely accomplice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A gathering of friends turns deadly when two gunmen shoot William Davis in the head. Kenda and his team dig into his past and start to suspect someone in William’s circle is lying.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Cooking Episode
programme.desc: Nick and Suzanne go head to head in the kitchen when Nick says cooking is \\"easy\\" and Suzanne challenges him to a family cooking competition.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Regift Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne tries to return an unlikely gift from Marilyin with Nick not knowing.

programme.title: The Exes

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a blistering hot day on Sunflower Valley. Bob and Wendy have got to finish building their workshop – making the workbenches and installing the power tools – it’s an inside job so the machines all get the day off.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are building a pedestrian crossing. Mrs Percival, meanwhile, has asked Molly to paint a mural of a jungle scene in the school playground.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s job today is to repair an eroded riverbank. There will be LOTS of mud to shift and Muck is beside himself with excitement. Before Muck can get stuck in, Bob needs him to fetch some equipment from JJ’s.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a goat run for Farmer Pickles new goat – Giddy. It’s Travis’s job to collect Giddy from Meg MacDonald the goat breeder. Spud teases Travis about being slow and Travis resolves to collect the goat very quickly.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Ellis has a batch of Doves delivered, to use in his magic act, and asks Bob to build a dovecote for his new birds to live in. Mr Ellis realises that he has to go to work but does not want to leave the birds at home alone.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and the machines are in Sunflower Valley setting up Wendy’s caravan. Scoop contacts Muck to find out where Bob has got to. Muck explains that they haven’t left Bobsville yet because they’ve lost Bob’s Dad!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are installing a bull-rush water recycling system to clean water from Farmer Pickles’ cottage. The clean water will be used to water Farmer Pickles new orchard. Bob explains that everything needs to be built in order – it’s a process.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s too busy to even tell the machines what the job is for today. He takes Scrambler to the dome and the others follow. It turns out that they are going to turn the whole of the Dome into a Visitors centre and its opening tomorrow!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Wendy and Bob have a very special announcement to make. They are going to fix up an old Houseboat for Wendy to live in. There’s a lot of hard work to be done. They need to make a gang plank, fix solar panels and give it a really good clean.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Beasley’s pipes and boiler are making banging noises and Bob is called in to replace them. Whilst Bob and Wendy are collecting the new Boiler from JJ, Molly explains that she is looking after Mrs Broadbent’s baby rabbits.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: There is great excitement at Bob’s yard when his new metal detector is delivered. He plans to use it to find a burst pipe in Farmer Pickles’ field, and promises Muck that afterwards they will hunt for buried treasure.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a Seaweed Farm for Annie Pickles – Farmer Pickles cousin. Scrambler volunteers to help Annie collect seaweed seedling on the beach.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Matter
programme.desc: When the mother ship hits dark matter, the ship dos not begin to heal itself. Zo'or is left in an unconscious state and Sandoval takes control. He decides it is time to liberate the Earth from the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keys to the Kingdom
programme.desc: The relic left by Ma'el is stolen from the mother ship. Zo'or threatens to destroy a major city if it isn't returned. Liam believes the final chapters contain information on synthesizing core energy.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Street Chase
programme.desc: Sandoval is watching via nanobots inside Street as she tries to decipher Ma'el's riddle. She tries to figure out how to escape from Sandoval and the Taelons forcing her to solve the riddle. She flashes back to childhood fears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Trapped by Time

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Atonement
programme.desc: Sandoval goes to Renee to request a trial to testify to atrocities against humanity committed by the Taelons. A manhunt for Sandoval begins when he quits and leaves the mother ship. Liam has to protect him on his way to the grand jury.

programme.title: The Lost World: Into the Fire

programme.title: The Lost World: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: Marguerite, Roxton, and Challenger take the place of Askwith aboard his ghost ship and return to the day of its fatal departure in 1915. Back on the Plateau, Veronica chases down Askwith.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Travelers
programme.desc: Malone remains missing, and the explorers' search party crosses paths with a trio of travelers. Marguerite becomes taken with the dashing leader, especially when he offers her a way off the Plateau.

programme.title: The Lost World: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: Roxton learns what it's like to be the hunted after he kills a Triceratops. Osina-a mystical, half-dinosaur guardian-puts a curse on him that makes him the target of a mysterious hunter.

programme.title: The Lost World: True Spirit
programme.desc: Veronica and Marguerite use a ouija board to communicate with Malone, who Veronica believes is trapped in a spirit realm. However, their attempt may have aroused the spirit of Saros, a dead warlord.

programme.title: 48 Hours: For Love or Money?
programme.desc: Celeste Beard claims she is innocent of the murder of her husband Steven Beard, co-founder of an Austin television station. After a life of abuse and depression, Celeste married Beard. In October 1999, Beard was fatally shot while lying in bed.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Killer App
programme.desc: The dangers of anonymous chat apps; a father discovers his 15-year-old daughter planning to run away with a 30-year-old man she met online; a teenage girl is found stabbed to death after making friends online.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Question of Murder
programme.desc: John Maloney, a Wisconsin police officer, was convicted of murdering his estranged wife, Sandy, in 1999. He has always maintained his innocence. After Maloney’s conviction, the prosecutor, Joe Paulus, pled guilty to accepting bribes to fix over 20 cases

programme.title: 48 Hours: Temptation
programme.desc: In June 2007, Dewayne Barrentine met Tausha Fields and soon after they began living together. Tausha told him some unbelievable stories about herself – leading Barrentine to verify her stories online, which resulted in the uncovering of a homicide.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in L.A.
programme.desc: Focuses on two California couples: the Adairs and the Shapiros. Mindy Shapiro discovered that her husband Michael, an orthopedic surgeon, was having an affair with Jeanie Adair, and in 1996, after 11 years of marriage, the couple opted for divorce.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: The investigation of the September 24, 1988 sexual torture-murder in Louisville, Kentucky, of Brenda Sue Schaefer.
